mapper.insert: insert into recipes (user_id, title, description, thumbnail, servings, cook_time, difficulty, created_at, updated_at) values (#{userId},#{title},#{description},#{thumbnail},#{servings},#{cookTime},#{difficulty},now(),now() )
insert into ingredients (recipe_id, name, amount) values (#{recipeId}, #{name}, #{amount})
mapper.select: select * from recipes order by created_at asc, id asc
select * from recipes where title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select * from recipes where title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or description like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
